snippet: A top Bahraini human rights activist, Nabeel Rajab, was formally charged on Thursday with insulting the Defense and Interior Ministries.
abstract: Bahraini human rights activist Nabeel Rajab is formally charged with insulting the Defense and Interior Ministries over Twitter posts.
lead_paragraph: A top Bahraini human rights activist, Nabeel Rajab, was formally charged on Thursday with insulting the Defense and Interior Ministries.
